summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to economic development, authorizing the Mayor or his designees to exercise the authority granted to the Director of the Economic Development Transition Project (also known as the Business Loan Transition Project) in Ordinance 115958; authorizing the transfer of business loan functions to a for-profit or non-profit agency through a RFP process; authorizing the Director XII in such Transition Project to make and modify contracts for certain loans and consultant services; and ratifying and confirming prior actions.
